text: Hi folks, I was wondering if it's possible to create a module that can also include a module? This so we can abstract away a piece CSS with fields in the parent module and have it applied to its children.  Thanks in advance!
Thanks Matt for the quick response!

As Matt said, nesting modules is not supported, as you wouldn’t have a UI in the page editor for the nested modules.  This would create a poor experience for site maintainers. A developer could work around this by adding fields to the parent module, but that results in a bad experience for the developers. In addition you could unintentionally create infinite loops.

Most of the situations you’d want this for are layout related. To address that we have the drag n drop area tags [currently in public beta] <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/drag-and-drop-areas>
